app.name: Omegatics for Support
app.short_description: The Shopbase app for Zendesk unites your business by displaying critical Shopbase data to your agents while they serve customers in Zendesk.
app.long_description:
#If you manage a Shopbase online store, you can simplify your support with this integration app. Next to each Zendesk ticket, you will see every relevant piece of information such as:
* order number
* quantity
* price
* paid date
* purchare items

All it takes is a few clicks to integrate the Zendesk App within your direct your Shopbase store. Make it easy for your customers to submit a ticket directly from your store.
#Any feedback is welcome: tranminhluyen.1993@gmail.com
app.installation_instructions:
1. Install Omegatics for Support app.

2. Add some details about your Shopbase store:

* domain
* api key (from private shopbase app)
* password app
* pattern url (email,order)
